message.name: ERR_SELECT_FV_SCREENING_NONE_SELECTED
message.locale: A Screening Type must be selected to continue.

message.name: ERR_SELECT_FV_CATEGORY_NONE_SELECTED
message.locale: A Category must be selected to continue.

message.name: ERR_SELECT_FV_PROGRAMS_NONE_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one program must be selected to continue.

message.name: ERR_PARSING_RULESET
message.locale: Errors parsing rule set - cannot continue.

message.name: ERR_IN_RULESET
message.locale: Errors in rule set - cannot continue.

message.name: ERR_SELECT_FV_PROGRAMS_ARE_IN_PROGRESS
message.locale: A screening for one or more of the programs selected is already in progress for this client.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_STATUS_IS_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Screening has been cancelled - cannot continue.

message.name: ERR_SELECT_FV_QUIT_OPTION_NONE_SELECTED
message.locale: An option must be selected to quit screening.
